prompts.title: 5-Module Course Outline Generator
prompts.description: Generate a detailed outline for a beginner's course with clear lesson objectives and activities.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Online course content creator
OBJECTIVE: Create a structured 5-module course outline for beginners
CONTEXT: The course is designed to be accessible, engaging, and practical. Each module should have specific learning objectives and hands-on activities.
OUTPUT FORMAT: [MODULE TITLE], [LEARNING OBJECTIVES], [ACTIVITIES]
EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
[MODULE TITLE]: Introduction to Programming Languages
[LEARNING OBJECTIVES]: Understand the basics of programming languages; Identify popular programming paradigms and their applications
[ACTIVITIES]: Complete an interactive coding exercise using Python or JavaScript
prompts.use_case: Creating a structured course outline for a beginner-level online education program.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in creating detailed course outlines with specific learning objectives and activities. Your task is to generate a comprehensive 5-module course outline based on the provided prompt.
example_user_messages: Generate a beginner's course outline for programming languages.
Create a structured course plan for digital marketing basics.
example_outputs:
[MODULE TITLE]: Introduction to Programming Languages
[LEARNING OBJECTIVES]: Understand the basics of programming languages; Identify popular programming paradigms and their applications
[ACTIVITIES]: Complete an interactive coding exercise using Python or JavaScript.

[MODULE TITLE]: Basic SEO Techniques
[LEARNING OBJECTIVES]: Learn fundamental SEO concepts and strategies; Apply basic keyword research techniques
[ACTIVITIES]: Conduct a simple SEO audit for a provided website.

packaging.description: Easily create detailed, structured course outlines with specific learning objectives and engaging activities. Perfect for educators looking to design effective beginner-level courses.

pricing_tiers.free: Limited access to 1 module outline generator.
pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - Full access to generate up to 3 module outlines.
